body:
[NEED]
Collaborative Decision — decide together.

[CONTEXT]
Group; 3–12 participants; proposal ready.

[PURPOSE]
Enable safe‑to‑try decisions quickly.

[LIVING PATTERNS]
- Early concerns improve outcomes.
- Small, reversible steps reduce risk.
- Time‑bound review keeps decisions alive.

[PROTOCOL STATEMENT]
Run a consent check: invite reasoned objections; improve or adopt.

[ADAPTATION NOTES]
Preserve consent step and review requirement.

[CLOSING]
Record adoption publicly; set review_date.
title: Consent Check
